scripts.bundle:build-webpack: yarn run clean:bundle && yarn run build:lingui && yarn run build:cpx && yarn run build:tsc --build && yarn run bundle:webpack
scripts.bundle:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn run bundle:build-webpack --config configs/webpack/development.ts
scripts.bundle:development:local:watch: yarn run clean:bundle && yarn run build:lingui && concurrently --kill-others --names "cpx,tsc,webpack" "yarn run build:cpx --watch" "yarn run build:tsc --watch" "yarn run env:cmd-cross TS_NODE_PROJECT=configs/webpack/tsconfig.json TS_NODE_FILES=true NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=local webpack-dev-server --config configs/webpack/development.ts"
scripts.bundle:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn run bundle:build-webpack --config configs/webpack/production.ts
scripts.serve: yarn run env:cmd-cross NODE_ENV=development ts-node scripts/serve.ts
scripts.start:local: yarn run bundle:production:local && yarn run serve
scripts.start:test: yarn run bundle:production:test && yarn run serve
scripts.start:staging: yarn run bundle:production:staging && yarn run serve
scripts.start:live: yarn run bundle:production:live && yarn run serve
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:bundle && yarn run clean:build
